action.action-desc: Ms. Brownley of California introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the deduction for mortgage insurance premiums.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Mortgage Insurance Tax Deduction Act of 2017.

section.header: Deduction for mortgage insurance premiums made permanent

subsection.text: Section 163(h)(3)(E) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking clause (iv).
The amendment made by this section shall apply to amounts paid or accrued after December 31, 2016.
